LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_genesCanTickOnlyOnMap:
If enabled, genes cannot tick outside the map, which should improve performance. However, this may break some gene mechanics that are designed to work outside of the map.
Use this option only if you are sure of what you are doing.
A restart is required.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_enableBodySizeGenes:
If enabled, body size genes will visually change the size of pawns.
A restart is required.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_fixGenesOnLoad: If enabled, it should fix all potentially broken genes. Please note that this will reset the cumulative effects of genes, such as deathrest (deathrest capacity serums).
LanguageData.WVC_Label_fixGeneAbilitiesOnLoad: Fix broken gene abilities on load
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_fixGeneAbilitiesOnLoad: If enabled, it should fix all potentially broken abilities. Please note that this will reset all gene abilities.
LanguageData.WVC_Label_fixGeneTypesOnLoad: Fix broken gene types on load
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_fixGeneTypesOnLoad: If enabled, it should fix all potentially broken gene types (classes). Safe version of "Fix broken genes". Since it only affects genes with wrong classes. If any genes have an incorrect class, messages will appear in the log.
LanguageData.WVC_Alert_fixBrokenShit:
How to use: Enable and load any save. The option only applies to the map on which the player is currently located.
It is not recommended to use more than one DEV-fix at a time. It might break something.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_reincarnation_EnableMechanic: If enabled, the mechanics will work as intended.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_ThrallMaker_ThrallsInheritMa: If enabled, thralls will, in addition to the basic set of genes, receive some rare master genes.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_enableInstabilityLastChanceM:
If enabled, then instabilization, having reached a critical point, will give a small head start to the pawn, provided that the pawn is not able to take care of itself.
It is recommended to leave this option enabled.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_bloodeater_disableAutoFeed: If enabled, then pawns with the bloodeater gene (and similar) WILL NOT automatically bite colonists.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_bloodeater_SafeBloodfeed:
If enabled, using the bloodfeed ability will not kill pawns if there is not enough blood. Instead, the blood loss value will drop to the minimum non-fatal level.
It is recommended to disable it only if you are looking for a challenge.
A restart is required.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_link_removeMechlinkWithGene:
If enabled, when the corresponding gene is removed, the mechlink is removed too.
Removing a mechlink or psylink is guaranteed to lead to bugs. Use at your own risk.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_link_removePsylinkWithGene:
If enabled, when the corresponding gene is removed, the psylink is removed too.
Removing a mechlink or psylink is guaranteed to lead to bugs. Use at your own risk.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_shapeshifter_enableStyleButt:
If enabled, the shapeshifter gene will also allow you to change the style of the pawn at any time. This option allows you to change the hairstyle and its color, the beard and its color, tattoos for the face and body.
Acts the same as the styling station from ideology, but does not allow you to dye clothes.
Requires the Ideology DLC, for obvious reasons.
